description:
This week I give you Ode to Men In Pain. This is for those of you who miss the formulaic simplicity of an empty room, a leather clad dominatrix and her fucking up a dude for no apparent reason. This no holds barred shoot will take you back to the good ole days of MenInPain.com!
xo,
Maitresse Madeline
title: Ode to MenInPain.com!
